20  """ 
21  A simple validator to make sure keyword arguments are valid. 
22  """ 
23   

24 -class ParameterError(Exception): 

25      """ 
26      Raised if an invalid argument is passed to kwargs_validator. 
27      """ 

28 -    def __init__(self, value): 

29          self.value = value 

30       

31 -    def __str__(self): 

32          return str(self.value) 

33   

34 -class kwargs_validator: 

35      """ 
36      Used to validate arguments. 
37      """ 

38 -    def validate(self, args, allowed_args): 

39          """ 
40          @param args: arguments to check for validity. 
41          @type args: iterable 
42          @param allowed_args: list of valid arguments. 
43          @type allowed_args: list 
44          @raises ParameterError: if an element of args is not in allowed_args. 
45          """ 
46          for arg in args: 
47              if arg not in allowed_args: 
48                  raise ParameterError("Parameter " + arg + " is not accepted by calling function.") 

49   
50  the_validator = kwargs_validator() 
51
